original_text: And when he cut the hair of his head (for at the end of every year he used to cut it; when it was heavy on him, he cut it), he weighed the hair of his head, two hundred shekels by the king's weight.
korean_text: 그의 머리털이 무거우므로 연말마다 깎았으며 그의 머리 털을 깎을 때에 그것을 달아본즉 그의 머리털이 왕의 저울로 이백 세겔이었더라

sentences.original_text: And when he cut the hair of his head
for at the end of every year he used to cut it
sentences.korean_translation: 매년 끝에 그는 그것을 자르곤 했으니

sentences.original_text: when it was heavy on him
he weighed the hair of his head
two hundred shekels by the king's weight
